name: Tap Master - Watch Game
description:
Tap Master's goal is simple: complete levels by tapping at the right time while the circle is above the target. To complete a level, you must successfully close the rings and reach the target score.

The road to becoming a Tap Master will certainly be challenging. Don't worry, the levels will start out easy and gradually become more difficult. Completing all levels will unlock the endless mode, allowing you to set your own personal high score!

Tap Master features:
– High quality Apple Watch game experience
– Support for all Apple Watch device sizes
– Themes created by color specialists
– Leveled and endless game modes
– Simple and relaxing gameplay
– Use of Apple Watch haptics

Tap Master may help you in improving your reaction times, timing, and calculations.
Apple Watch haptics have been used to improve the gaming experience.
Endless mode is available at all times, so you can play Tap Master anytime you want!


Become a Tap Master!
